name: Fruit Pop II
description:
Fruit Pop 2! Even Fruitier!

Sit back and get Popping with this super relaxing, sugary sweet arcade adventure. Mixing the incredible "Peggle" with brick breaker makes for happy smiles all around!

Fruit Pop is fun for the whole family, Anyone can play! Using a fun physics engine the game can be both rewarding and well, have you going ''NO! SO CLOSE!''

Shoot your fruit and get some crazy combo's, pickup awesome abilities and get that score as high as you can!.

Fruit Pop 2 includes improved mechanics, new fun features and crazy new levels!

The game will include 45 beautiful levels in Total which you will be able to Pass or Golden Pass each stage, bringing some replay value to those who want to get the Golden Pass score!

GAME-PLAY

The game is a super relaxing , fun and at times, hard physics based game-play.
at the beginning of each stage you start off with 8 oranges, and you will need to hit as many apples as you can per orange, as well as trying to hit crystals which grant multipliers!.
Oh and lets not forget about the awesome pickups and abilities!. there are 10 abilities including Mega orange, Firework, Triple orange, extra pop and many more crazy and fun pickups, so don't forget to hit those pears and strawberries either!.

Now go get popping!

Achievements and score tracking included as well.
